“Open”

This dialog box allows you to do the following

l Work with an individual customization template:

What You Can Configure in Templates

Open a template for editing

Create a new template

l View or modify workstation settings

Follow the instructions to open a template and then use the commands on the Workstation menu.

What You Can Configure for the Workstation

l Configure Preop Manager

Click the Open button in the Preop Manager section.

Preop Manager
